properties.name: Chalatenango

La Palma - Artisan village famous for crafts
Mountain Hiking - Scenic trails and cool climate

placesToVisit.name: El Pital
placesToVisit.description: The highest point in El Salvador at 2,730 meters, offering stunning views and cool temperatures.

placesToVisit.name: La Palma
placesToVisit.description: Famous artisan village known for colorful handcrafted items and traditional art.

adventure.name: Hike to El Pital
adventure.description: Challenging hike to the highest point in El Salvador with breathtaking views.

adventure.description: Explore mountain trails on bike through cool pine forests.

culture.name: La Palma Artisan Tour
culture.description: Visit workshops and learn about traditional Salvadoran crafts.
